name: timesheet-management-system
description: A comprehensive timesheet management system with role-based access control

scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:generate: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma generate
scripts.db:studio: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma studio
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec backend npm run db:seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
